allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Unsplash integration for image discovery

This PR adds Unsplash integration to enable users to discover and save images from Unsplash:

- Add /discover page with Unsplash photo search and browsing
- Implement server actions for Unsplash API integration
- Add source attribution tracking (source, sourceUrl, attribution fields)
- Update Pin interface to support Unsplash metadata
- Add "Discover" navigation link to header
- Create SaveUnsplashToBoardModal for saving Unsplash photos to boards
- Add proper Unsplash attribution display in PinDetailModal
- Update database schema to support new attribution fields
- Add UNSPLASH_ACCESS_KEY to environment variables

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
